aspect.name: Genomics
aspect.subtitle: Genome annotation
aspect.intro-text: The gene structure and other genome annotation in LegFed mines are loaded from the chado database which powers the LIS site.

aspect.name: Proteins
aspect.subtitle:
Protein and proteomics
data
aspect.intro-text: Protein annotation (including protein domains and protein matches) is loaded from the chado database which powers the LIS site.

aspect.name: Reactome
aspect.subtitle: Protein reactome/pathway data
aspect.intro-text: Protein pathways are imported from Gramene Plant Reactome.
